extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addItem​(int auctionId, AuctionItem item)
    This method is called by server to add items to the active item auction list (the itemList HashMap)
    java.lang.String bidForItem​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String emailAddress, int auctionId, int bidAmount)
    This method allows the user by the buyer client to bid for selected items, but ensures that this is within certain boundaries.
    java.lang.String closeListing​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, int auctionId)
    This method is used by the seller client to close any listings entered by the user (remove the item from the item list of active items).

    Returns the active item list
    java.lang.String viewListing()
    Creates the string of all the active items being auctioned and their details.

  • Constructor Details

    • ItemListing

      public ItemListing()

  • Method Details

    • addItem

      public void addItem​(int auctionId, AuctionItem item)
      This method is called by server to add items to the active item auction list (the itemList HashMap)
      Parameters:
      auctionId - this is the key for the HashMap, each item has a unique auction ID so they are easily identified
      item - this is the item to be added to the list

    • bidForItem

      public java.lang.String bidForItem​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String emailAddress, int auctionId, int bidAmount)
      This method allows the user by the buyer client to bid for selected items, but ensures that this is within certain boundaries.
      Parameters:
      username - this is the username of the user who bids for the item, used to verify the winner and the bids
      emailAddress - this is the email address of the user who bids for the item
      auctionId - this is the auctionID of the item they are bidding on, used to identify the item
      bid - the amount the user wants to bid
      Returns:

    • closeListing

      public java.lang.String closeListing​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password, int auctionId)
      This method is used by the seller client to close any listings entered by the user (remove the item from the item list of active items).
      Parameters:
      username - this is the username of the user requesting the closure (used for verification)
      password - this is the password of the user requesting the closure (used for verification)
      auctionId - this is the auctionId of the item that they are requesting a closure for
      Returns:

    • viewListing

      public java.lang.String viewListing()
      Creates the string of all the active items being auctioned and their details. This is used by the buyer client to browse active items.
      Returns:
      returns all the active items as a String

    • getItemList

      public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​AuctionItem> getItemList()
      Returns the active item list
      Returns:
      the itemList HashMap
